definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: purple, red-purple, i.e. purple thread & cloth (As.argamannu COT Ex 25:4, Ar. 0’arjawa0nun, Aram. 0argwono0, cf. [[אַרְגְּוׇן]] supr.; etym. dub.; possibly Skr. râgaman, adj. red, reddish, fr. râga, red colour, so Benary cf. Thes Add:111 RobGes; vid. MV; Thes earlier, fr. [[רגם]]; but prob. loan-word, cf. also Lag:BN 205; Pers. 0rgw0n is also cited by PS)—form alw. as above—
purple thread, cf. esp. Ex 35:25, Ex 39:3, Es 1:6;

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: mostly Ex (P) with ref. to the hangings of tabernacle, the ephod, etc.; seld. alone; c. [[תְּכֵלֶת]], violet (q.v.), [[תּוֹלַעַת שָׁנִי]], ([[מָשְׁזׇב]]) [[שֵׁשׁ]], (also [[עִוִּים]]) Ex 25:4, Ex 26:1, Ex 26:31, Ex 26:36, Ex 27:16, Ex 35:8, Ex 35:25, Ex 35:35, Ex 36:8, Ex 36:35, Ex 36:37, Ex 38:18, Ex 38:23, Ex 39:24 (on text v. Di) v:Ex 39:29; with these + [[זׇהָב]] Ex 28:5, Ex 28:6, Ex 28:8, Ex 28:15, Ex 39:2, Ex 39:3, Ex 39:5, Ex 39:8; om. ´[[שֵׁשׁ מ]] Ex 28:33, Ex 39:1; also of temple-hangings, with [[תְּכֵלֶת]], [[בּוּץ]] & [[כַּרְמִיל]] 2Ch 3:14 cf. 2Ch 2:13 (v. also 2Ch 2:6 v. sub [[אַרְגְּוׇן]]).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: as indicating wealth & luxury of Tyre, c. [[שֵׁשׁ]], [[רִקְמָה]], [[תְּכֵלֶת]] Ez Eze 27:7; c. [[רִקְמָה]] & [[בּוּץ]] v:Eze 27:16 (as articles of commerce); also in Persia, c. [[בּוּץ]] Es 1:6.

purple cloth, chiefly of garments, ´[[בֶּגֶד א]] Nu 4:13, Ju Jdg 8:26; ´[[וְתַכְרִיח בּוּץ וְא]] Es 8:15, [[לְבוּשָׁהּ]] ´[[שֵׁשׁ וְא]] Pr 31:22 ; [[לְבוּשָׁם]] ´[[תְּכֵלָת וְא]] Je 10:9; also ´[[מֶרְכָּבוֹ א]] Ct So 3:10; in simile, of woman's hair Ct So 7:6.
